titles.title: You are mighty and strong to save,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are mighty and strong to save,
You are mighty and strong to save,
You are mighty and strong to save,
Rescuer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
From the heavens You came
To the depths of the grave
To redeem for Your praise,
Rescuer.
Jesus, You overcame
Death itself for our sake,
Let the world now proclaim:
Rescuer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh what a Saviour!
Freedom forever,
We lift our hands with chains undone.
Hearts that know mercy
Cannot stay silent,
We sing the song of saving love.
